spells.title: Crowbar
spells.description: Smashes things, pries things open. Deals 2 damage.

spells.title: Sword
spells.description:
Regular sword. Deals 4 damage.
(requires “Aspiring Swordsman” ability to use).

spells.title: Light Crossbow
spells.description:
Shoots where you point it, dealing 4 damage.
(requires “Aspiring Marksman” ability to use)

spells.title: Slingshot
spells.description: Shoots a small projectile(like a pebble). Deals 3 damage.

spells.title: Old-timey Gun
spells.description: Deals 5 damage. Takes a minute to reload.

spells.title: Leather Armor
spells.description:
Basic armor. Increases you max HP by 3 points.
(requires "Light Armor" ability to wear).

spells.title: Ninja Armor
spells.description:
Suit made out of light black clothes. Increases you max HP by 3 points.
Makes you very hard to notice in the dark.
(requires "Light Armor" and "Aspiring Ninja" ability to wear).

spells.title: Steel Armor
spells.description:
Increases your max HP by 6 points.
(requires "Heavy Armor" ability to wear).

spells.title: Obsidian Armor
spells.description:
Increases your max HP by 8 points.
(requires "Heavy Armor" to wear).

spells.title: Grappling Hook Gun
spells.description: Shoots the grappling hook to the distance of up to 50 meters, reels it back in.

spells.title: Torches
spells.description: Provide light. Set things on fire.

spells.title: Glider
spells.description: Artificial wings you can use for gliding.
